subject: Re: does anybody on this group listen to files????
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Sorry. I've been swamped listening, relistening, downloading, 
cutting, pasting, and finally uploading some EVPs we caught back on 
the 25th of November. When I get a chance, I really have to play 
major catchup and listen to many that've been posted on here.

Thanks,
Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Come on guy's a little feedback!
> 
> I posted 16 files two day's ago from the RSbox and only got 2 
replies 
> and both were from ann.
> 
> I posted a bunch of frank's box files today and not one response.
> 
> lets jump start this group with some new and positive energy 
everybody 
> do some sessions and post the results, lets start the advance into 
the 
> future.
> 
> Bruce
>
